page.title: 11RISELEY NEWSLETTER(1)
page.content: The Riseley Village Newsletter is published six times a year,that is every two months. It consists,on the average,of two sheets of printed type. It is typed by a village resident on a typewriter which cuts stencils. Another Riseley person,who has his own buisness,and has an ink duplicating machine,prints the newsletters. My familiy helps me with the boring task of stapling the sheets together. At the present time,four hundred and five copies are distributed by a team of eleven villagers,mostly women at home, who enjoy the walk and a chance to chat.
